scenario_text.value: What the—what happened to the blizzard?

This tunnel isn’t that long... What could be
happening here?

Ha ha, talk about lucky! It just up and
stopped on us!

It’s more like it didn’t snow at all on this
side of the tunnel.

And look at these flowers...ain’t they
something else? The forest is a sea of red.

I feel like...I’ve seen them in our field
guide, maybe?

If memory serves, these are called red spider
lilies.
But this isn’t right. It’s spring, and...
Yes, they bloom in the autumn.
What in the world is going on here...?

(Should we <color=#B41919>check out this area a little more</color>
before heading to the shrine?)
